VisualViewport.summary: The VisualViewport interface of the Visual Viewport API represents the visual viewport for a given window. For a page containing iframes, each iframe, as well as the containing page, will have a unique window object. Each window on a page will have a unique VisualViewport representing the properties associated with that window.

remarks.para: You can get a window's visual viewport using .

blockquote.para: Note: Only the top-level window has a visual viewport that's distinct from the layout viewport. Therefore, it's generally only the VisualViewport object of the top-level window that's useful. For an {{htmlelement("iframe")}}, visual viewport metrics like always correspond to layout viewport metrics like .
